argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_trclfvub | |- ( R e. V -> ( t+ ` R ) C_ ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> ( t+ ` R ) C_ ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> Rel R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_relssdmrn | |- ( Rel R -> R C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssequn1 | |- ( R C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) <-> ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) = ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpi | |- ( R C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) -> ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) = ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 4, 6 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) = ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> ( t+ ` R ) C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_xpss | |- ( dom R X. ran R ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6ss | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> ( t+ ` R ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel ( t+ ` R ) <-> ( t+ ` R ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Rel R ) -> Rel ( t+ ` R ) ) |
